DashboardComponent.name: DashboardComponent
DashboardComponent.description: Represents a dashboard component, which can be a chart, metric, table, or gauge on a dashboard. Access is read-only.

CustomReportId.description: Requires the user permission "Manage All Private Reports and Dashboards." The ID of the report that provides data for the dashboard component. See Report.

DashboardId.description: The ID of the dashboard that contains the dashboard component. See Dashboard.

Name.description: The name of the dashboard component.
